title: Product docs
introduction: Use the Activity Tracker service to capture a record of your IBM Cloud activities and monitor the activity of your IBM Cloud account. You can use this service to investigate abnormal activity and critical actions, and comply with regulatory audit requirements. The events that are collected comply with the Cloud Auditing Data Federation (CADF) standard.
